title: Norris enthusiastic about Orchid , emphasizes development and high - level exposure
body_text:
Following her reappointment as Head Coach of the Santos PNG Orchids, Tahnee Norris today expressed her excitement and gratitude, outlining a clear vision for the team's growth and development leading into the 2026 Rugby League World Cup.
"I'm excited to be part of this campaign and the growth of Women's Rugby League and PNG RFL," Norris stated. She acknowledged the significant support from sponsors and the PNGRFL board, underscoring their recognition of women's rugby league's importance in Papua New Guinea. "To be appointed for two years in the lead up to the World Cup and be able to be part of the growth of the sport is exciting for me."
